subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Tim Cahill got his first M.L.S. point with an assist on Markus Holgersson’s goal, and the Red Bulls moved into first place in the Eastern Conference with a 2-0 win over the Houston Dynamo.
snippet: Tim Cahill got his first M.L.S. point with an assist on Markus Holgersson’s goal, and the Red Bulls moved into first place in the Eastern Conference with a 2-0 win over the Houston Dynamo.
